Description: Clay tablet; complete; purchase of a slave-girl from Hahhum by a "naditu"; seals; Old Babylonian.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.221)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
